summary:
-  Drive innovation through thought and change leadership within the OT/ICS network, server, and application systems within 82 manufacturing facilities.
-  Evangelize the application requirements of Industrial Control Systems and manufacturing processes within the IT organization.
-  Collaborate in the creation and presentation of 1, 3, and 5-year strategic OT road maps to IT Senior Leadership.
-  Work cross-functionally with peer IT organizational leaders, as well as Engineering and Industrial Automation leaders to define enterprise-wide reference architectures and design standards.
- Lead efforts in deploying standard architectures within OT infrastructure within recently acquired plants.

-  Manage the design, deployment, and day-to-day function of network & server infrastructure for manufacturing facilities and lead the OT Team technical staff.
- Design and deploy cloud technology infrastructure for the manufacturing environment.
- Act as lead engineer, teaching and mentoring staff to enable future delegation and growth.

-  Serve as the lead architect of manufacturing plant floor network and server infrastructure for company clients.
-  Design and implement custom network, server, and industrial control system telemetry solutions using Python tools like Netmiko, Regex, and RESTful APIs.
-  Serve as a project manager: ensuring timelines, milestones, and deliverables are met within or below budget.
- Generate and present written proposals to clients that clearly communicate project goals, deliverables, and timelines.

-  Installed and commissioned broadcast television technology.
-  Designed and deployed video transcoding server solutions.

-  Managed, delegated, and maintained the operation of all district network and server infrastructure.
-  Planned and managed the district IT budget.

-  Provided first-line of IT Support to school staff and students.
-  Managed bulk deployments of software packages to classrooms & computer labs.
